attributes.action: Name A new Royal Navy warship to be called HMS Gurkha.
attributes.additional_details:
Name a new Royal Navy warship HMS Gurkha, to celebrate 200 years of the British Gurkha’s Service.
As 2014 is not just 100 year anniversary of World War One and 75 years anniversary of World War Two, it is also 200 years of British Gurkha’s service too.
As well as in the past there has been Royal Navy Destroyers and Frigates named HMS Gurkha before, it would carryon a Royal Navy and British Gurkha’s link going back many years.
So we are asking to celebration of Gurkha’s brave and loyal service to the British Crown, Parliament and People,  a new Warship should be named HMS Gurkha especially in 2014.
Equally to honour both Royal Naval and Gurkha Veteran’s, who served in WW1 & 2 right upto the time of the Falklands War and the last HMS Gurkha being decommissioned too.
PLEASE EVERYONE SIGN UP TO THIS E-PETITION, TO HONOUR ALL GURKHA VETERAN’s & CURRENT GURKHA’s SERVICE TO THE UNITED KINGDOM.
ALSO SEE GURKHA WELFARE RIGHTS ARE HONOURED TOO, THANK YOU GURKHA MUM & GOD FATHER.
